com.hf.fundamental.dao

Class XMLIdentityDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hf.fundamental.dao.XMLIdentityDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdentityDAO

    public class XMLIdentityDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements IdentityDAO
    The XMLIdentityDAO class implements the Identity object CRUD methods for Identity.

    Uses Matcher implementations com.hf.fundamental.match.impl.

    Author:
    Hoang / Favio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLIdentityDAO()
      By invoking the constructor, it will look for the file stored previously and then parse it to a DOM format
